name: Flox Don't Stop (gatlincasey)
description:
Description

Team up with your friend to get as high as you can. With one player controlling Blox and the other controlling Flox, you'll have to cooperate in order to place platforms, gather feathers, and dash your way to the top of the leaderboard. 

Flox: Flox can dash, float, and maneuver around to gather feathers.

Blox: Blox can place down platforms to allow Flox to climb higher.

Controls

FLOX

  • Left Analog Stick: Move
  • A Button: Jump
  • Right Bumper Hold: Float
  • Right Bumper Release: Dash

BLOX

  • J: Move Left
  • L: Move Right
  • K: Move Down
  • I: Rotate
Team

Casey Gatlin, Dan Spence, Deeprashmi Nath, Dong Wang, Jackson Keller, Jolie Uk
